column1: ## noun : declension : paradigm / eg / subtype / irregular
*tuus, tua, tuum - your, yours (for singular possessor)
*suus, sua, suum - his, her, its, theirs (reflexive)
* is, ea, id - he, she, it
*īdem, eadem, idem - the same, same as
*First- and Second-declension pronominal adjectives: uter (which of two), either
*First- and Second-declension pronominal adjectives: solus (sole, alone)
*The genitive singular alīus is often replaced by alterīus or by aliēnus 'of another'.
*First- and Second-declension pronominal adjectives: alter (other of two)
